from math import gcd
from collections import deque
MOD = 1000000008

def calculate_beauty_sum(n, beauties, edges):
    neighbors = [[] for _ in range(n + 1)]
    for (v1, v2) in edges:
        neighbors[v1].append(v2)
        neighbors[v2].append(v1)
    visited = [False] * (n + 1)
    dq = deque()
    dq.append((1, []))
    sum_beauties = 0
    while dq:
        (u, gcds) = dq.popleft()
        gcdns = [[beauties[u - 1], 1]]
        sum_beauties = (sum_beauties + beauties[u - 1]) % MOD
        for (g, c) in gcds:
            gcdn = gcd(beauties[u - 1], g)
            sum_beauties = (sum_beauties + gcdn * c) % MOD
            if gcdn == gcdns[-1][0]:
                gcdns[-1][1] += c
            else:
                gcdns.append([gcdn, c])
        visited[u] = True
        for v in neighbors[u]:
            if not visited[v]:
                dq.append((v, gcdns))
    return sum_beauties
